page.title: 13Families - Carla
page.content: My name is Carla McLoughlin and I am 9. I live near the marsh in Blackheath. We live in a modernised old house. I have lots of cousins in the village. I have a younger brother and sister called Patrick and Megan. Megan is naughty although she is only one. Dad works all over the world on oil rigs. He works on the safety capsules. I have two pet cats called Mork and Mindy and I would like a dog, a Cavalier King Charles Spaniel. I like Enid Blyton books and ghost stories, but I like all books too. School is super. I like everything , from the work to the Christmas pantomime. My hobbies are baking, sewing and reading. My favourite food is salad, but I don't like eating vegetables. I would like to work with children, or books, when I grow up.
